item.title: Using and Abusing Aliases with PowerShell
item.description: Shimming Aliases with PowerShell - Introduction In preparation for another UB Lockdown, I had a goal in mind, work on a new tool for Windows Persistence. It’s good to thoroughly understand other developers tools that have been made such as Sharphide or SharPerist . However, I wanted to create something from scratch and do something...

item.title: The Hunt for LOLBAS
item.description: Using Powershell to Hunt for LOLBAS - Hunting for LOLBAS Introduction Like many pentesters I am a big fan of the LOLBAS project. and even recently contributed to it. Although, the project is incredibly useful I couldn’t find a tool that automated the process of finding them so I decided to make one. Then again how useful...

item.title: Power of Covenant
item.description: Deploying Covenant - Using Covenant & Red Teaming Introduction This past weekend, I had my first ever red teaming experience at University of Buffalo called Lockdown. I knew from the start I would be tackling Windows for this competition; however, I wasn’t sure what I wanted to do. Did I want to use...
